title: Stromboli Morsels
ingredients: ['225g fresh Italian sausage, casings removed', '450g ready-made bread dough', '1 tablespoon English mustard', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '5 slices cooked ham', '6 slices pepperoni sausage', '6 slices salami', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', '4 slices processed cheese, such as Kraft singles, unwrapped', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '45g dry polenta']
